entry.title: Steal My Phone, Steal My Heart (Daminette)
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,241Chapters: 5/8Kudos: 65

Summary: After 48 sleepless hours in Paris, a disheveled Marinette accidentally grabs the wrong phone—belonging to a rude American tourist. What follows is a chaotic chain of misadventures across the city. But as the day spirals out of control, could this unexpected mix-up be the start of something better?

entry.title: Come Back Little Bug
entry.summary:
Author: Spiteful_Imp

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,086Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 82

Summary: Marinette has been through literal hell unlike any she could have ever imagined before. Unable to take it any longer, she finally manages to break free from Paris and winds up in Gotham in hopes of healing. Instead, she meets someone who flips her world upside down. Only time will tell if it's for better or worse. Will Damian Wayne ever manage to get her to lower her defenses, or will he forever be doomed to watch the girl who reminds him so much of his bug fall into a cycle of destruction?

entry.title: Hard Choice
entry.summary:
Author: Writerclouds

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,569Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: Marinette once lived in Gotham, but she had to move to Paris to due to unforeseenable situation. Years passed, old friends she had made was lost in contact...Yet, she was once more back at Gotham, her old city and where all her childhood memories remain. She eventually fell in love with a green eyed boy. Though he and his brother were connected with her mission, purifying the Lazarus pit. By doing so, killing them.She was faced with a hard choice, would she save them or destroy the Lazarus Pit?

entry.title: I don't need to see to find you
entry.summary:
Author: Assassinscred

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,453Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 1,976

Summary: Marinette and Damian were raised to be married one day. They were the culmination of two powerful bloodlines. He is the next head of the League of Assassins and she's the next Grand guardian of the miraculous.But great plans never hold up well under first contact with the enemy. With a coup and an acid attack, Marinette finds herself without the boy she grew up with, unable to see the world, and with a new family to teach her how to function without the use of her eyes while waiting to be called back to her betrothed's side.

entry.title: letters to lovers (and the aftermath of cherry wine)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 158,745Chapters: 41/?Kudos: 3,270

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng and Damian Wayne-Al Ghul are pen-pals for three years, during that time, Marinette slowly but surely falls in love (and Damian falls with her). Damian has to heal from his childhood and Marinette is still changing from growing pains; they are leaving partners and friends and toxicity and gods behind them.**Warning: reading this may cause whiplash-inducing criterion shift.You will no longer view anger as mad or friends the same way. Your concepts of "childhood" and "the right thing" will forever be changed. You will not be able to change it back.The average species lasts four million years on earth. We've been around for 300,000 of those years, but our ancestors were born six million years ago. To live you must adapt; change. Are you changing? What does that say about you?Reading this may cause delusions. You might start seeing ghosts. Or get a therapist.

entry.title: Heirs
entry.summary:
Author: otome_wandering

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 265,056Chapters: 19/76Kudos: 1,612

Summary: Marinette is the Star of the Order of the Miraculous, the still-in-training head, as well as the True Ladybug leading the Court of Miracles. After years at Hawkmoth's mercy, Marinette has decided that enough is enough and is reaching out to Batman, the detective of detectives to help her track down the villian's true identity. What better way to do this than a field trip to Gotham?Damian, the bloodson and heir to both the Cowl and the Demon's Head, wants nothing to do with the French Class who has won the Wayne Enterprises Summer Internship, yet his father insists he needs better interpersonal skills. He supposes it won't kill him to try to work with this supposedly skilled class president if it means that everyone will get off his back for being 'aggressively asocial' (although he will still keep NDAs on standby).A seal of fate, a blood right, and a hidden prophecy lead Marinette and Damian on a rollercoaster of emotions, humourous misunderstandings, comeuppance -- and marriage?!___Basically my attempt at a soulmate AU, full of just about every Damianette cliche and trope I can think of. And some original lore to make it work.Updating MonthlyMaribat Awards 2024 Winner

entry.title: Defenders of the Universe
entry.summary:
Author: aldanavroon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,729Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 107

Summary: In a universe where divine forces walk reborn among mortals, balance is everything—and it’s breaking. The ancient Order of Guardians has fallen. Chaos stirs. And four Souls, once meant to appear one at a time, have returned all at once.Creation. Destruction. Lie. Intuition.They’re not ready. They’re not trusted. And one of them looks a little too much like someone Batman once called his son.As legends rise and secrets unravel, the fate of the multiverse may rest on the shoulders of children—ones who carry the weight of gods.

  • Graphic Depictions Of Violence
